title: 2-Minute Cheese Quesadillas Recipe
description: Make a cheese quesadilla in the microwave with flour tortillas and shredded Cheddar cheese for a quick and easy snack every kid will love!

Recipes 2-Minute Cheese Quesadillas 4.5 (38) 33 Reviews 13 Photos My 4-year-old loves these cheese quesadillas! Just two ingredients and a microwave are needed for this quick and easy snack. Serve with a little dish of salsa or ketchup for dipping. Submitted by Jackie Updated on September 10, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 13 13 13 13 Cook Time: 5 mins Total Time: 5 mins Servings: 2 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 2 servings 2 (10 inch) flour tortillas 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Place one flour tortilla onto a large microwave-safe plate. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Sprinkle with Cheddar, then top with remaining tortilla. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Microwave on high until cheese is melted, about 1 minute. Slice like a pizza to serve. Cook’s Note You can use smaller tortillas and any kind of cheese. I Made It Print 83 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 446 Calories 24g Fat 37g Carbs 20g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 2 Calories 446 % Daily Value * Total Fat 24g 31% Saturated Fat 13g 66% Cholesterol 59mg 20% Sodium 796mg 35% Total Carbohydrate 37g 13% Dietary Fiber 2g 8% Total Sugars 2g Protein 20g 40% Calcium 498mg 38% Iron 3mg 15% Potassium 164mg 3% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of 2-Minute Cheese Quesadillas 01 of 13 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 13 Photo by  Emery 03/10/2021 03 of 13 Photo by  Marian Geerling 08/19/2020 04 of 13 Photo by  MrsPolk 08/24/2019 05 of 13 Photo by  bdweld 05/03/2018 06 of 13 Photo by  Yoly 02/24/2018 This is the fastest and easiest way to make a quesadilla but not the most flavorful. We always make ours on a cast iron skillet. We use pepper jack and cheddar cheese and we crisp both sides. 07 of 13 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 10/03/2017 Had fun making these with the grandkids. We made them into mummies. Don't forget the candy eyeballs. These work well with flour or corn tortillas. 08 of 13 Photo by  mommyluvs2cook 07/29/2017 I have to give this 5 stars, I used to make this when I was working late and would have to pick up the kids from my MIL's (yes they ate there) with no time to make dinner for myself. Always hit the spot and who doesn't love instant cheesy food! 09 of 13 Photo by  fabeveryday 02/04/2017 Couldn't be easier! I do mine in a frying pan as opposed to the microwave, and use a Mexican cheese blend instead of just plain cheddar. You can add simple ingredients too, like sliced canned black olives, black beans, canned chunk chicken, and salsa for some easy variations. 10 of 13 Photo by  zyxst 12/18/2015 As PP suggested, I fried the tortilla on the stove top in a little olive oil (1/4 tsp), sprinkled the cheese on, and let it cook until the cheese melted. A tad greasy on the first one, but fine for the second. 1 2 Next You’ll Also Love Easy Quesadillas 43 Ratings Black Bean and Corn Quesadillas 1,953 Ratings Chicken Quesadillas 1,196 Ratings Microwave Quesadilla 7 Ratings Sincronizada 2 Ratings Shrimp Quesadillas 149 Ratings Fajita Quesadillas 60 Ratings Philly Steak Quesadillas 26 Ratings Easy Chorizo Street Tacos 50 Ratings Peanut Butter Banana Quesadilla 15 Ratings Hawaiian Pizza Quesadillas 4 Ratings Bean and Cheese Toasterdilla 3 Ratings Quesadilla Burgers 17 Ratings Spaghetti Tacos 79 Ratings Zucchini Breakfast Quesadilla 3 Ratings Vegetable Quesadillas 41 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: Jackie
instructions: Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios;Place one flour tortilla onto a large microwave-safe plate.
